entry.name: jQuery.mobile.path.getDocumentBase
entry.title: jQuery.mobile.path.getDocumentBase()
entry.desc: Utility method for retrieving the original document base URL.

argument.name: asParsedObject
argument.desc: The function normally returns the original document base URL as a string. However, if you specify a truthy value for this parameter, the original document base URL will be returned in a hash as a parsed URL.
